verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> "Enter <S%H935><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> you and all <S%H3605><s%> your household; <S%H1004><s%> for you [alone] I have seen <S%H7200><s%> [to be] righteous <S%H6662><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me in this <S%H2088><s%> time. <S%H1755><s%>

"You shall take <S%H3947><s%> with you of every <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> animal <S%H929><s%> by sevens, <S%H7651><s%> a male <S%H376><s%> and his female; <S%H802><s%> and of the animals <S%H929><s%> that are not clean <S%H2889><s%> two, <S%H8147><s%> a male <S%H376><s%> and his female; <S%H802><s%>

also <S%H1571><s%> of the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> by sevens, <S%H7651><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female, <S%H5347><s%> to keep <S%H2421><s%> offspring <S%H2233><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"For after seven <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> I will send <S%H4305><s%> rain <S%H4305><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights; <S%H3915><s%> and I will blot <S%H4229><s%> out from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H3351><s%> thing <S%H3351><s%> that I have made. <S%H6213><s%>"
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him.

Now Noah <S%H5146><s%> was six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when the flood <S%H3999><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> upon the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Then Noah <S%H5146><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> and his sons' wives <S%H802><s%> with him entered <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H8392><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the flood. <S%H3999><s%>

Of clean <S%H2889><s%> animals <S%H929><s%> and animals <S%H929><s%> that are not clean <S%H2889><s%> and birds <S%H5775><s%> and everything <S%H3605><s%> that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the ground, <S%H127><s%>

there went <S%H935><s%> into the ark <S%H8392><s%> to Noah <S%H5146><s%> by twos, <S%H8147><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female, <S%H5347><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Noah. <S%H5146><s%>
And it came <S%H1961><s%> about after the seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that the water <S%H4325><s%> of the flood <S%H3999><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> upon the earth. <S%H776><s%>

In the six <S%H8337><s%> hundredth <S%H3967><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Noah's life, <S%H9132><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> on the same <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the fountains <S%H4599><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> deep <S%H8415><s%> burst <S%H1234><s%> open, <S%H1234><s%> and the floodgates <S%H699><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> were opened. <S%H6605><s%>
And the rain <S%H1653><s%> fell <S%H1961><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> for forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights. <S%H3915><s%>

On the very <S%H6106><s%> same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> and Shem <S%H8035><s%> and Ham <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth, <S%H3315><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah, <S%H5146><s%> and Noah's wife <S%H802><s%> and the three <S%H7969><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with them, entered <S%H935><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%>

they and every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing <S%H7431><s%> that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> sorts <S%H3671><s%> of birds. <S%H6833><s%>

So they went <S%H935><s%> into the ark <S%H8392><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> by twos <S%H8147><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> was the breath <S%H7307><s%> of life. <S%H9132><s%>

And those that entered, <S%H935><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> closed <S%H5462><s%> [it] behind <S%H1157><s%> him.

Then the flood <S%H3999><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> for forty <S%H705><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and the water <S%H4325><s%> increased <S%H7235><s%> and lifted <S%H5375><s%> up the ark, <S%H8392><s%> so that it rose <S%H7311><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the water <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> and increased <S%H7235><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> upon the earth; <S%H776><s%> and the ark <S%H8392><s%> floated <S%H1980><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the water. <S%H4325><s%>

And the water <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> more <S%H3966><s%> and more <S%H3966><s%> upon the earth, <S%H776><s%> so that all <S%H3605><s%> the high <S%H1364><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> everywhere <S%H3605><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> were covered. <S%H3680><s%>
The water <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> higher, <S%H4605><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were covered. <S%H3680><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> that moved <S%H7430><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> perished, <S%H1478><s%> birds <S%H5775><s%> and cattle <S%H929><s%> and beasts <S%H9130><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> swarming <S%H8318><s%> thing <S%H8318><s%> that swarms <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth, <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> mankind; <S%H120><s%>

of all <S%H3605><s%> that was on the dry <S%H2724><s%> land, <S%H2724><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> nostrils <S%H639><s%> was the breath <S%H5397><s%> of the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of life, <S%H9132><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%>

Thus He blotted <S%H4229><s%> out every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H3351><s%> thing <S%H3351><s%> that was upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the land, <S%H127><s%> from man <S%H120><s%> to animals <S%H929><s%> to creeping <S%H7431><s%> things <S%H7431><s%> and to birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and they were blotted <S%H4229><s%> out from the earth; <S%H776><s%> and only <S%H389><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> was left, <S%H7604><s%> together with those that were with him in the ark. <S%H8392><s%>
And the water <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
